text: Rafael Alun Trisambodo (born in Yogyakarta 11 August 1967) is a former echelon III civil servant who most recently served as Head of the General Section of the DGT South Jakarta Regional Office. He is known to have assets worth 56 billion rupiah which was revealed after the persecution case committed by his son. He is also known as "Penguasa Jaksel". ==Related pages== * StopBayarPajak * Tax resistance in Indonesia * Gayus Tambunan ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people
title: Rafael Alun Trisambodo
